SQL_STR:
SELECT 
  METHOD_ID,
  METHOD_CODE,
  METHOD_NAME,
  METHOD_DESC,
  ENABLE_FLAG,
  DEPR_CLASS 
FROM
  XC_FA_DEPR_METHODS
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO XC_FA_DEPR_METHODS (
  METHOD_ID,
  METHOD_CODE,
  METHOD_NAME,
  METHOD_DESC,
  ENABLE_FLAG,
  DEPR_CLASS,
  CREATED_BY,
  CREATION_DATE
) 
VALUES(
  ${METHOD_ID},
  ${METHOD_CODE},
  ${METHOD_NAME},
  ${METHOD_DESC},
  ${ENABLE_FLAG},
  ${DEPR_CLASS},
  ${CREATED_BY},
  ${CREATION_DATE}
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XC_FA_DEPR_METHODS SET
  METHOD_NAME = ${METHOD_NAME},
  METHOD_DESC = ${METHOD_DESC},
  ENABLE_FLAG = ${ENABLE_FLAG},
  DEPR_CLASS = ${DEPR_CLASS},
  LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
  LAST_UPDATE_DATE =${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
WHERE  METHOD_CODE = ${METHOD_CODE}

SQL_STR:
SELECT 
  EMP_ID,
  EMP_CODE,
  EMP_NAME,
  CASE EMP_SEX WHEN '1' THEN '男' WHEN '2' THEN '女' ELSE '' END EMP_SEX,
  ID_NO,
  PHONE_NO,
  ADDRESS,
  EMAIL,
  TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') BIRTHDAY
FROM XIP_PUB_EMPS
WHERE EMP_CODE LIKE '%${empCodeName}%'
    OR EMP_NAME LIKE '%${empCodeName}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO XIP_PUB_EMPS(
  EMP_ID,
  EMP_CODE,
  EMP_NAME,
  EMP_SEX,
  ID_NO,
  PHONE_NO,
  ADDRESS,
  EMAIL,
  ATTRIBUTE2,
  BIRTHDAY,
  CREATED_BY, 
  CREATION_DATE
) VALUES(
  ${EMP_ID},
  ${EMP_CODE},
  ${EMP_NAME},
   (CASE ${EMP_SEX} WHEN '男' THEN '1' WHEN '女' THEN '2' ELSE '' END),
  ${ID_NO},
  ${PHONE_NO},
  ${ADDRESS},
  ${EMAIL},
  'Y',
  CASE WHEN ${BIRTHDAY}=NULL OR ${BIRTHDAY}='' 
       THEN NULL 
       ELSE TO_DATE(${BIRTHDAY}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') 
       END,
  ${CREATED_BY}, 
  ${CREATION_DATE}
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XIP_PUB_EMPS
   SET EMP_CODE = ${EMP_CODE},
       EMP_NAME = ${EMP_NAME},
       EMP_SEX = (CASE ${EMP_SEX} WHEN '男' THEN '1' WHEN '女' THEN '2' ELSE '' END),
       ID_NO = ${ID_NO},
       PHONE_NO = ${PHONE_NO},
       ADDRESS = ${ADDRESS},
       EMAIL = ${EMAIL},
       ATTRIBUTE2='Y',
       BIRTHDAY = CASE WHEN ${BIRTHDAY}=NULL OR ${BIRTHDAY}='' 
                       THEN NULL 
                       ELSE TO_DATE(${BIRTHDAY}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') 
                       END,
       LAST_UPDATED_BY= ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, 
       LAST_UPDATE_DATE= ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
 WHERE EMP_ID = ${EMP_ID}

SQL_STR:
SELECT DEPT_ID,DEPT_CODE,DEPT_NAME,DEPT_SHORT_NAME,(select DEPT_CODE from xip_pub_depts where dept_id =d.UP_DP_ID)as UP_DEPT_CODE,(select org_code from xip_pub_orgs where org_id =d.ORG_ID)as ORG_CODE
   FROM XIP_PUB_DEPTS d
WHERE ORG_ID LIKE '%${orgId}%'
     AND DEPT_NAME LIKE '%${deptName}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
insert into xip_pub_depts(DEPT_ID,DEPT_CODE,DEPT_NAME,DEPT_SHORT_NAME,ENABLE_FLAG,UP_DP_ID,ORG_ID,CREATED_BY,CREATION_DATE)
values(${DEPT_ID},${DEPT_CODE},${DEPT_NAME},${DEPT_SHORT_NAME},'Y',(select c.dept_id from(select dept_id from xip_pub_depts d,xip_pub_orgs o where d.ORG_ID = o.org_id and o.org_code =${ORG_CODE} and d.DEPT_CODE = ${UP_DEPT_CODE} )c),(select org_id from xip_pub_orgs where org_code =${ORG_CODE}),${CREATED_BY},${CREATION_DATE})
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
update xip_pub_depts
set DEPT_NAME = ${DEPT_NAME},
    DEPT_SHORT_NAME = ${DEPT_SHORT_NAME},
    UP_DP_ID = (select c.dept_id from(select dept_id from xip_pub_depts d,xip_pub_orgs o where d.ORG_ID = o.org_id and o.org_code =${ORG_CODE} and d.DEPT_CODE = ${UP_DEPT_CODE} )c),
    ORG_ID = (select org_id from xip_pub_orgs where org_code = ${ORG_CODE}),
    LAST_UPDATED_BY =${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
    LAST_UPDATE_DATE =${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
where DEPT_ID = ${DEPT_ID}

SQL_STR:
select CAT_ID,
       CAT_CODE,
       CAT_NAME,
       UP_NAME AS UP_CODE,
       IS_LEAF,
       (SELECT VAL_NAME FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL WHERE VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY' AND VAL_CODE = XC.FA_PROPERTY) FA_PROPERTY 
FROM XC_FA_CATS XC left join (SELECT CAT_NAME UP_NAME,CAT_CODE CODE FROM XC_FA_CATS) U ON U.CODE =XC.UP_CODE
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO XC_FA_CATS (
	CAT_ID,
	CAT_CODE,
	CAT_NAME,
        UP_CODE,
        FA_PROPERTY,
	IS_LEAF,
    CREATION_DATE, 
	CREATED_BY,
  LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,
   TAG_ID

)
VALUES
	(
		${CAT_ID},
		${CAT_CODE},
		${CAT_NAME},
		${UP_CODE},
(select ifnull( (select t.VAL_CODE FROM   xip_pub_val_set_dtl t where t.VAL_NAME =${FA_PROPERTY} AND  t.VAL_SET_CODE  = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'),${FA_PROPERTY}) as property),
             '1',
    ${CREATION_DATE},
    ${CREATED_BY},
    ${CREATION_DATE},
    ${TAG_ID}
	)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XC_FA_CATS
SET 
 CAT_NAME = ${CAT_NAME},
 UP_CODE =(SELECT CASE WHEN ${UP_CODE} = '' THEN CONCAT( (select t.VAL_CODE  from xip_pub_val_set_dtl t where t.VAL_NAME = ${FA_PROPERTY} and t.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'),'_ROOT') ELSE (SELECT A.CAT_CODE FROM (SELECT S.CAT_CODE FROM XC_FA_CATS S WHERE S.CAT_NAME = ${UP_CODE}) A) END CAT_CODE),
 IS_LEAF=${IS_LEAF},
 FA_PROPERTY = (select t.VAL_CODE  from xip_pub_val_set_dtl t where t.VAL_NAME = ${FA_PROPERTY} and t.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'),
 LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE},
 LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
 TAG_ID = ${TAG_ID}
WHERE
	CAT_CODE = ${CAT_CODE}

SQL_STR:
SELECT
o.ORG_ID,
o.ORG_CODE,
o.ORG_NAME,
o.ORG_SHORT_NAME,
(select ORG_CODE from xip_pub_orgs where org_id = o.UP_ORG_ID) as UP_ORG_CODE
from xip_pub_orgs o
where o.ORG_NAME LIKE '%${orgName}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
insert into xip_pub_orgs(ORG_ID,ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME,ORG_SHORT_NAME,ORG_TYPE,ENABLE_FLAG,UP_ORG_ID,CREATED_BY,CREATION_DATE)
values(${ORG_ID},${ORG_CODE},${ORG_NAME},${ORG_SHORT_NAME},'O','Y',(select c.org_id from (select org_id from xip_pub_orgs where ORG_CODE = ${UP_ORG_CODE}) c),${CREATED_BY},${CREATION_DATE})
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
update xip_pub_orgs
SET ORG_NAME = ${ORG_NAME},
    ORG_SHORT_NAME =${ORG_SHORT_NAME},
    UP_ORG_ID = (select c.org_id from(select org_id from xip_pub_orgs where ORG_CODE = ${UP_ORG_CODE})c),
    LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
    LAST_UPDATE_DATE=${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
where ORG_ID = ${ORG_ID}

SQL_STR:
SELECT 
  EMP_ID,
  EMP_CODE,
  EMP_NAME,
  CASE EMP_SEX WHEN 1 THEN '男' WHEN 2 THEN '女' ELSE '' END EMP_SEX,
  ID_NO,
  PHONE_NO,
  ADDRESS,
  EMAIL,
  DATE_FORMAT(BIRTHDAY, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BIRTHDAY
FROM XIP_PUB_EMPS
WHERE EMP_CODE LIKE '%${empCodeName}%'
    OR EMP_NAME LIKE '%${empCodeName}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO XIP_PUB_EMPS(
  EMP_ID,
  EMP_CODE,
  EMP_NAME,
  EMP_SEX,
  ID_NO,
  PHONE_NO,
  ADDRESS,
  EMAIL,
  ATTRIBUTE2,
  BIRTHDAY,
  CREATED_BY, 
  CREATION_DATE
) VALUES(
  ${EMP_ID},
  ${EMP_CODE},
  ${EMP_NAME},
  (CASE ${EMP_SEX} WHEN '男' THEN 1 WHEN '女' THEN 2 ELSE '' END),
  ${ID_NO},
  ${PHONE_NO},
  ${ADDRESS},
  ${EMAIL},
  'Y',
  CASE WHEN ${BIRTHDAY}=NULL OR ${BIRTHDAY}='' 
       THEN NULL 
       ELSE DATE_FORMAT(${BIRTHDAY}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
       END,
  ${CREATED_BY}, 
  ${CREATION_DATE}
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XIP_PUB_EMPS
   SET EMP_CODE = ${EMP_CODE},
       EMP_NAME = ${EMP_NAME},
       EMP_SEX = (CASE ${EMP_SEX} WHEN '男' THEN 1 WHEN '女' THEN 2 ELSE '' END),
       ID_NO = ${ID_NO},
       PHONE_NO = ${PHONE_NO},
       ADDRESS = ${ADDRESS},
       EMAIL = ${EMAIL},
       ATTRIBUTE2 = 'Y',
       BIRTHDAY = CASE WHEN ${BIRTHDAY}=NULL OR ${BIRTHDAY}='' 
                       THEN NULL 
                       ELSE DATE_FORMAT(${BIRTHDAY}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
                       END,
       LAST_UPDATED_BY= ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, 
       LAST_UPDATE_DATE= ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
 WHERE EMP_ID = ${EMP_ID}

SQL_STR:
SELECT 
  a.ASSET_ID, 
  a.LEDGER_ID, 
  (SELECT l.LEDGER_NAME FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_ID = a.LEDGER_ID) LEDGER_NAME,
  a.PERIOD_CODE, 
  a.ZCBM, 
  a.ZCMC, 
  a.GGXH, 
  a.XLH, 
  a.ZZS,
  (SELECT l.VAL_NAME FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL l WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY' AND l.VAL_CODE = a.FA_PROPERTY) FA_PROPERTY,
  (SELECT c.CAT_NAME FROM xc_fa_cats c WHERE c.CAT_CODE = a.CAT_CODE) CAT_NAME,
  DATE_FORMAT(a.QYRQ, '%Y-%m-%d') QYRQ,
  a.SYNX,
  (SELECT CONCAT(d.DEPT_CODE, '||', d.DEPT_NAME) FROM xip_pub_depts d WHERE d.DEPT_ID = a.CBZX) CBZX,
  (SELECT CONCAT(e.EMP_CODE, '||', e.EMP_NAME) FROM xip_pub_emps e WHERE e.EMP_ID = (SELECT u.EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_users u WHERE u.USER_ID = a.CREATED_BY)) BGR,
  (SELECT u.USE_NAME FROM xc_fa_uses u WHERE u.USE_CODE = a.ZCYT) ZCYT,  
  a.CGFP,
  (SELECT la.ADDING_DESC FROM xc_fa_ld_adding la WHERE la.ADDING_CODE = a.ZJFS AND la.LEDGER_ID = a.LEDGER_ID) ZJFS,
  CASE WHEN a.LRFS = 'I' THEN '初始化' WHEN a.LRFS = 'M' THEN '手工录入' WHEN a.LRFS = 'AP' THEN '应付导入' ELSE '' END LRFS,
  a.CFDD,
  a.ZCSM,
  a.YZ,
  a.LJZJ_LJTX,
  a.SL,
  (SELECT s.DIM_NAME FROM xc_gl_dimensions s WHERE s.DIM_CODE = a.DW) DW,
  a.JZZB,
  a.CZL,
  CASE WHEN a.SFZJ = 'Y' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END SFZJ,
  (SELECT s.METHOD_NAME FROM xc_fa_depr_methods s WHERE s.METHOD_CODE = a.ZJFF) ZJFF,
  (SELECT l.VAL_NAME FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL l WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_AMORTIZATION_RULE' AND l.VAL_CODE = a.TXGZ) TXGZ,
  (SELECT acc.ACC_NAME 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_CODE = a.ZCKM 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = a.LEDGER_ID)) ZCKM,
   (SELECT acc.ACC_NAME 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_CODE = a.LJZJTXKM 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
		             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
		            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
		              AND l.LEDGER_ID = a.LEDGER_ID)) LJZJTXKM,                           
  (SELECT acc.ACC_NAME 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_CODE = a.FYKM 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = a.LEDGER_ID)) FYKM,  
  (SELECT acc.ACC_NAME 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_CODE = a.JZZBKM 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = a.LEDGER_ID)) JZZBKM_VIEW, 
  (SELECT v.VENDOR_NAME FROM xc_ap_vendors v WHERE v.VENDOR_ID = a.VENDOR_ID) VENDOR_NAME, 
  (SELECT CONCAT(p.PROJECT_CODE, '||', p.PROJECT_NAME) FROM XC_PM_PROJECTS p WHERE p.PROJECT_ID = a.PROJECT_ID) PROJECT_NAME,
  a.TYQJ,
  a.JTQJ,
  a.ZJNX,
  a.KSJTQJ,
  a.YJTJE,
  a.ZJJE,
  a.JZ,
  DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') CREATION_DATE                         
FROM
  xc_fa_additions a 
WHERE a.LEDGER_ID LIKE '%${LEDGER_ID}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO xc_fa_additions(
  ASSET_ID, 
  LEDGER_ID, 
  PERIOD_CODE, 
  ZCBM, 
  ZCMC, 
  GGXH, 
  XLH, 
  ZZS,
  FA_PROPERTY,
  CAT_CODE,
  QYRQ,
  SYNX,
  CBZX,
  BGR,
  ZCYT,  
  CGFP,
  ZJFS,
  LRFS,
  CFDD,
  ZCSM,
  YZ,
  LJZJ_LJTX,
  SL, 
  DW,
  JZZB,
  CZL,
  SFZJ,
  ZJFF,
  TXGZ,
  ZCKM,
  LJZJTXKM,                           
  FYKM,  
  JZZBKM, 
  VENDOR_ID,
  PROJECT_ID,
  TYQJ,
  JTQJ,
  ZJNX,
  KSJTQJ,
  YJTJE,
  ZJJE,
  JZ,
  CREATED_BY,
  CREATION_DATE
) VALUES (
  ${ASSET_ID}, 
  (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}),
  ${PERIOD_CODE}, 
  ${ZCBM}, 
  ${ZCMC}, 
  ${GGXH}, 
  ${XLH}, 
  ${ZZS},
  (SELECT l.VAL_CODE FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL l WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY' AND l.VAL_NAME = ${FA_PROPERTY}),
  (SELECT c.CAT_CODE FROM xc_fa_cats c WHERE c.CAT_NAME = ${CAT_NAME}),
  DATE_FORMAT(${QYRQ}, '%Y-%m-%d'),
  CASE WHEN ${SYNX} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${SYNX} END,
  (SELECT d.DEPT_ID FROM xip_pub_depts d WHERE CONCAT(d.DEPT_CODE, '||', d.DEPT_NAME) = ${CBZX}), 
  (SELECT u.USER_ID FROM xip_pub_users u WHERE u.EMP_ID = (SELECT e.EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_emps e WHERE CONCAT(e.EMP_CODE, '||', e.EMP_NAME) = ${BGR})),
  (SELECT USE_CODE FROM xc_fa_uses u WHERE u.USE_NAME = ${ZCYT}),  
  ${CGFP},
  (SELECT la.ADDING_CODE FROM xc_fa_ld_adding la WHERE la.ADDING_DESC = ${ZJFS} AND la.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME})),
  CASE WHEN ${LRFS} = '初始化' THEN 'I' WHEN ${LRFS} = '手工录入' THEN 'M' WHEN ${LRFS} = '应付导入' THEN 'AP' ELSE '' END,
  ${CFDD},
  ${ZCSM},
  CASE WHEN ${YZ} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${YZ} END,
  CASE WHEN ${LJZJ_LJTX} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${LJZJ_LJTX} END,
  CASE WHEN ${SL} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${SL} END,
  (SELECT s.DIM_CODE FROM xc_gl_dimensions s WHERE s.DIM_NAME = ${DW}),
  CASE WHEN ${JZZB} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${JZZB} END,
  CASE WHEN ${CZL} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${CZL} END,
  CASE WHEN ${SFZJ} = '是' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END,
  (SELECT s.METHOD_CODE FROM xc_fa_depr_methods s WHERE s.METHOD_NAME = ${ZJFF}), 
  (SELECT l.VAL_CODE FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL l WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_AMORTIZATION_RULE' AND l.VAL_NAME = ${TXGZ}),
  (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${ZCKM} 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${LJZJTXKM}
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
		             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
		            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
		              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),                           
  
  (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${FYKM} 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),  
  
  (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE 
   FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
  WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${JZZBKM} 
    AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))), 
  (SELECT v.VENDOR_ID FROM xc_ap_vendors v WHERE v.VENDOR_NAME = ${VENDOR_ID}),
  (SELECT p.PROJECT_ID FROM XC_PM_PROJECTS p WHERE CONCAT(p.PROJECT_CODE, '||', p.PROJECT_NAME) = ${PROJECT_NAME}),
  ${TYQJ},
  ${JTQJ},
  CASE WHEN ${ZJNX} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${ZJNX} END,
  ${KSJTQJ},
  CASE WHEN ${YJTJE} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${YJTJE} END,
  CASE WHEN ${ZJJE} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${ZJJE} END,
  CASE WHEN ${JZ} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${JZ} END,
  ${CREATED_BY},
  ${CREATION_DATE}
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE xc_fa_additions SET
  LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}), 
  PERIOD_CODE = ${PERIOD_CODE}, 
  ZCBM = ${ZCBM}, 
  ZCMC = ${ZCMC}, 
  GGXH = ${GGXH}, 
  XLH = ${XLH}, 
  ZZS = ${ZZS},
  FA_PROPERTY = (SELECT l.VAL_CODE FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL l WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY' AND l.VAL_NAME = ${FA_PROPERTY}),
  CAT_CODE = (SELECT c.CAT_CODE FROM xc_fa_cats c WHERE c.CAT_NAME = ${CAT_NAME}),
  QYRQ = DATE_FORMAT(${QYRQ}, '%Y-%m-%d'),
  SYNX = CASE WHEN ${SYNX} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${SYNX} END,
  CBZX = (SELECT d.DEPT_ID FROM xip_pub_depts d WHERE CONCAT(d.DEPT_CODE, '||', d.DEPT_NAME) = ${CBZX}),
  BGR = (SELECT u.USER_ID FROM xip_pub_users u WHERE u.EMP_ID = (SELECT e.EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_emps e WHERE CONCAT(e.EMP_CODE, '||', e.EMP_NAME) = ${BGR})),
  ZCYT = (SELECT USE_CODE FROM xc_fa_uses u WHERE u.USE_NAME = ${ZCYT}),  
  CGFP = ${CGFP},
  ZJFS = (SELECT la.ADDING_CODE FROM xc_fa_ld_adding la WHERE la.ADDING_DESC = ${ZJFS}  AND la.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME})),
  LRFS = CASE WHEN ${LRFS} = '初始化' THEN 'I' WHEN ${LRFS} = '手工录入' THEN 'M' WHEN ${LRFS} = '应付导入' THEN 'AP' ELSE '' END,
  CFDD = ${CFDD},
  ZCSM = ${ZCSM},
  YZ = CASE WHEN ${YZ} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${YZ} END,
  LJZJ_LJTX = CASE WHEN ${LJZJ_LJTX} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${LJZJ_LJTX} END,
  SL = CASE WHEN ${SL} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${SL} END,
  DW = (SELECT s.DIM_CODE FROM xc_gl_dimensions s WHERE s.DIM_NAME = ${DW}),
  JZZB = CASE WHEN ${JZZB} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${JZZB} END,
  CZL = CASE WHEN ${CZL} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${CZL} END,
  SFZJ = CASE WHEN ${SFZJ} = '是' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END,
  ZJFF = (SELECT s.METHOD_CODE FROM xc_fa_depr_methods s WHERE s.METHOD_NAME = ${ZJFF}),
  TXGZ = (SELECT l.VAL_CODE FROM XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL l WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_AMORTIZATION_RULE' AND l.VAL_NAME = ${TXGZ}),
  ZCKM = (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE
            FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
	   WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${ZCKM} 
             AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                                      FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                                     WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                                       AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  LJZJTXKM = (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE 
                FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
               WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${LJZJTXKM}
                 AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
             		                  FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
		                         WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
		                           AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),                           
  FYKM = (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE 
            FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
           WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${FYKM} 
             AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                                      FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                                     WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                                       AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),  
  JZZBKM = (SELECT acc.ACC_CODE 
              FROM xc_gl_accounts acc 
             WHERE acc.ACC_NAME = ${JZZBKM} 
               AND acc.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                                        FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                                       WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = acc.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                                         AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))), 
  VENDOR_ID = (SELECT v.VENDOR_ID FROM xc_ap_vendors v WHERE v.VENDOR_NAME = ${VENDOR_NAME}),
  PROJECT_ID = (SELECT p.PROJECT_ID FROM XC_PM_PROJECTS p WHERE CONCAT(p.PROJECT_CODE, '||', p.PROJECT_NAME) = ${PROJECT_NAME}),
  TYQJ = ${TYQJ},
  JTQJ = ${JTQJ},
  ZJNX = CASE WHEN ${ZJNX} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${ZJNX} END,
  KSJTQJ = ${KSJTQJ},
  YJTJE = CASE WHEN ${YJTJE} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${YJTJE} END,
  ZJJE = CASE WHEN ${ZJJE} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${ZJJE} END,
  JZ = CASE WHEN ${JZ} = '' THEN 0 ELSE ${JZ} END,
  LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
  LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
 WHERE ASSET_ID = ${ASSET_ID}

SQL_STR:
SELECT
  u.USER_ID,
  u.USER_NAME,
  u.PASSWORD,
  e.EMP_CODE,
  u.ATTRIBUTE1
FROM XIP_PUB_USERS u
LEFT JOIN xip_pub_emps e ON u.emp_id = e.emp_id
WHERE u.USER_NAME LIKE '%${userName}%'
   AND (e.EMP_CODE LIKE '%${empCodeName}%' OR e.EMP_NAME LIKE '%${empCodeName}%')
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO XIP_PUB_USERS(
  USER_ID,
  USER_NAME,
  PASSWORD,
  EMP_ID,
  USER_TYPE,
  START_DATE,
  END_DATE,
  ATTRIBUTE1,
  CREATED_BY, 
  CREATION_DATE
) VALUES(
  ${USER_ID},
  ${USER_NAME},
  '96e79218965eb72c92a549dd5a330112',
  (SELECT EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_emps WHERE EMP_CODE = ${EMP_CODE}),
  'U',
  ${CREATION_DATE},
  TO_DATE('2099-05-01 12:12:12', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
  ${ATTRIBUTE1},
  ${CREATED_BY}, 
  ${CREATION_DATE}
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XIP_PUB_USERS
   SET USER_NAME = ${USER_NAME},
       EMP_ID = (SELECT EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_emps WHERE EMP_CODE = ${EMP_CODE}),
       USER_TYPE = 'U',
       ATTRIBUTE1 = ${ATTRIBUTE1},
       LAST_UPDATED_BY= ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, 
       LAST_UPDATE_DATE= ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
 WHERE USER_ID = ${USER_ID}

SQL_STR:
SELECT p.POST_ID,
       p.POST_CODE,
       p.POST_NAME,
       p.POST_DESC,
       p.POST_LEVEL,
       (SELECT d.dept_code FROM xip_pub_depts d WHERE d.DEPT_ID = p.DEPT_ID) DEPT_CODE,
       (SELECT o.ORG_CODE FROM xip_pub_orgs o WHERE o.ORG_ID = p.ORG_ID) ORG_CODE
   FROM XIP_PUB_POSTS p
WHERE p.ORG_ID LIKE '%${orgId}%'
     AND p.DEPT_ID LIKE '%${deptId}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO xip_pub_posts (
  POST_ID,
  POST_CODE,
  POST_NAME,
  POST_DESC,
  POST_LEVEL,
  ENABLE_FLAG,
  DEPT_ID,
  ORG_ID,
  CREATED_BY,
  CREATION_DATE
) 
VALUES
  (
    ${POST_ID},
    ${POST_CODE},
    ${POST_NAME},
    ${POST_DESC},
    ${POST_LEVEL},
    'Y',
    (SELECT 
      c.dept_id 
    FROM
      (SELECT 
        dept_id 
      FROM
        xip_pub_depts d,
        xip_pub_orgs o 
      WHERE d.ORG_ID = o.org_id 
        AND o.org_code = ${ORG_CODE} 
        AND d.DEPT_CODE = ${DEPT_CODE}) c),
    (SELECT 
      org_id 
    FROM
      xip_pub_orgs 
    WHERE org_code = ${ORG_CODE}),
    ${CREATED_BY},
    ${CREATION_DATE}
  )
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE 
  xip_pub_posts 
SET
  POST_CODE = ${POST_CODE},
  POST_NAME = ${POST_NAME},
  POST_DESC = ${POST_DESC},
  POST_LEVEL= ${POST_LEVEL},
  DEPT_ID = (SELECT 
      c.dept_id 
    FROM
      (SELECT 
        dept_id 
      FROM
        xip_pub_depts d,
        xip_pub_orgs o 
      WHERE d.ORG_ID = o.org_id 
        AND o.org_code = ${ORG_CODE} 
        AND d.DEPT_CODE = ${DEPT_CODE}) c),
  ORG_ID = 
  (SELECT 
    org_id 
  FROM
    xip_pub_orgs 
  WHERE org_code = ${ORG_CODE}),
  LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
  LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE} 
WHERE POST_ID = ${POST_ID}

SQL_STR:
SELECT
  u.USER_ID,
  u.USER_NAME,
  u.PASSWORD,
  e.EMP_CODE,
  u.USER_TYPE,
  DATE_FORMAT(u.LAST_CHG_PW_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LAST_CHG_PW_DATE,
  u. HAVE_REST_PW,
  DATE_FORMAT(u.START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') START_DATE,
  DATE_FORMAT(u.END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END_DATE,
  u.STATUS,
  u.ATTRIBUTE1,
  u.ATTRIBUTE2,
  u.ATTRIBUTE8,
  u.ATTRIBUTE9
FROM XIP_PUB_USERS u
LEFT JOIN xip_pub_emps e ON u.emp_id = e.emp_id
WHERE u.USER_NAME LIKE '%${userName}%'
   AND (e.EMP_CODE LIKE '%${empCodeName}%' OR e.EMP_NAME LIKE '%${empCodeName}%')
   AND u.USER_TYPE = 'U'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO XIP_PUB_USERS(
  USER_ID,
  USER_NAME,
  PASSWORD,
  EMP_ID,
  USER_TYPE,
  START_DATE,
  END_DATE,
  ATTRIBUTE1,
  CREATED_BY, 
  CREATION_DATE
) VALUES(
  ${USER_ID},
  ${USER_NAME},
  '96e79218965eb72c92a549dd5a330112',
  (SELECT EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_emps WHERE EMP_CODE = ${EMP_CODE}),
  'U',
  ${CREATION_DATE},
  DATE_FORMAT('2099-05-01 12:12:12', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
  ${ATTRIBUTE1},
  ${CREATED_BY}, 
  ${CREATION_DATE}
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XIP_PUB_USERS
   SET USER_NAME = ${USER_NAME},
       EMP_ID = (SELECT EMP_ID FROM xip_pub_emps WHERE EMP_CODE = ${EMP_CODE}),
       USER_TYPE = 'U',
       ATTRIBUTE1 = ${ATTRIBUTE1},
       LAST_UPDATED_BY= ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, 
       LAST_UPDATE_DATE= ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}
 WHERE USER_ID = ${USER_ID}

SELECT
  ADDING_ID,

from

INSERT INTO XC_FA_ADDING_METHOD (
	ADDING_ID,
	ADDING_CODE,
	ADDING_NAME,
	ADDING_DESC,
    CREATION_DATE, 
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,

TAG_ID

${CREATION_DATE},

 ${TAG_ID}

UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE XC_FA_ADDING_METHOD
SET ADDING_CODE = ${ADDING_CODE},
 ADDING_NAME = ${ADDING_NAME},

WHERE

SQL_STR:
select 
 '${language}' LANGUAGE,
  a.USE_ID,
  a.USE_CODE,
  a.USE_NAME,
  a.USE_DESC,
 (SELECT CASE WHEN t.VAL_NAME IS NULL OR t.VAL_NAME = '' THEN l.VAL_NAME ELSE t.VAL_NAME END VAL_NAME
     FROM xip_pub_val_set_dtl l
     LEFT JOIN XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL_LANG t 
            ON l.VAL_SET_CODE = t.VAL_SET_CODE  
           AND l.VAL_CODE = t.VAL_CODE 
           AND t.VAL_SET_LANG = '${language}'
    WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'
      AND l.VAL_CODE = a.FA_PROPERTY) FA_PROPERTY


from 
  xc_fa_uses a 
where a.FA_PROPERTY like '%${queryBy}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO xc_fa_uses (
	USE_ID,
	USE_CODE,
	USE_NAME,
	USE_DESC,
    FA_PROPERTY,
  CREATED_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
  CREATION_DATE,
  TAG_ID
)
VALUES
	(
		${USE_ID},
		${USE_CODE},
		${USE_NAME},
		${USE_DESC},
  (select t.VAL_CODE  from xip_pub_val_set_dtl t where t.VAL_NAME = ${FA_PROPERTY} and t.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'),
        ${CREATED_BY},
${CREATION_DATE},
  ${CREATION_DATE},
${TAG_ID}
	)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE xc_fa_uses
SET USE_CODE = ${USE_CODE},
 USE_NAME = ${USE_NAME},
 USE_DESC = ${USE_DESC},
 FA_PROPERTY = (select t.VAL_CODE  from xip_pub_val_set_dtl t where t.VAL_NAME = ${FA_PROPERTY} and t.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'),
TAG_ID = ${TAG_ID}
WHERE
	USE_CODE= ${USE_CODE}

SELECT 
  REASON_ID,

  XC_FA_CLEAN_REASON

VALUES

   ${REASON_CODE}, 
   ${REASON_NAME}, 
   ${REASON_DESC}, 
   ${CREATED_BY}, 
   ${CREATION_DATE}
  )

SQL_STR:
SELECT 
  '${language}' LANGUAGE,
  s.SETTING_ID,
  (SELECT l.LEDGER_NAME FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID) LEDGER_NAME,
  CONCAT(c.CAT_CODE, '||', c.CAT_NAME) CAT_NAME,
  (SELECT CONCAT(c1.CAT_CODE, '||', c1.CAT_NAME) FROM xc_fa_cats c1 WHERE c1.CAT_CODE = c.UP_CODE) UP_CAT_NAME,
  (SELECT CASE WHEN t.VAL_NAME IS NULL OR t.VAL_NAME = '' THEN l.VAL_NAME ELSE t.VAL_NAME END VAL_NAME
     FROM xip_pub_val_set_dtl l
     LEFT JOIN XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL_LANG t 
            ON l.VAL_SET_CODE = t.VAL_SET_CODE  
           AND l.VAL_CODE = t.VAL_CODE 
           AND t.VAL_SET_LANG = '${language}'
    WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_PROPERTY'
      AND l.VAL_CODE = c.FA_PROPERTY) FA_PROPERTY,
  s.SYNX,
  s.ZJFF,
  CASE WHEN s.SFZJ = 'Y' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END SFZJ,
  (SELECT CASE WHEN t.VAL_NAME IS NULL OR t.VAL_NAME = '' THEN l.VAL_NAME ELSE t.VAL_NAME END VAL_NAME
     FROM xip_pub_val_set_dtl l
     LEFT JOIN XIP_PUB_VAL_SET_DTL_LANG t 
            ON l.VAL_SET_CODE = t.VAL_SET_CODE  
           AND l.VAL_CODE = t.VAL_CODE 
           AND t.VAL_SET_LANG = '${language}'
    WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_AMORTIZATION_RULE'
      AND l.VAL_CODE = s.TXGZ) TXGZ,
  s.CZL,
  (SELECT CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME)
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE a.ACC_CODE = s.YZKM 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID)) YZKM,
  (SELECT CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) 
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE a.ACC_CODE = s.LJZJTXKM 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID)) LJZJTXKM, 
  (SELECT CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) 
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE a.ACC_CODE = s.JZZBKM 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID)) JZZBKM,
  (SELECT CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) 
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE a.ACC_CODE = s.QLKM 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID)) QLKM,
  (SELECT CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) 
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE a.ACC_CODE = s.FYKM 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID)) FYKM,
  (SELECT CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) 
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE a.ACC_CODE = s.JZSSKM 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = s.LEDGER_ID)) JZSSKM
  FROM xc_fa_ld_cat_settings s
  LEFT JOIN xc_fa_cats c ON c.CAT_CODE = s.CAT_CODE
 WHERE s.LEDGER_ID = '${ledgerId}'
   AND c.CAT_NAME LIKE '%${catName}%'
   AND c.FA_PROPERTY LIKE '%${faProperty}%'
INSERT_SQL_STR:
INSERT INTO xc_fa_ld_cat_settings(
  SETTING_ID,
  LEDGER_ID,
  CAT_CODE,
  SYNX,
  ZJFF,
  SFZJ,
  TXGZ,
  CZL,
  YZKM,
  LJZJTXKM,
  QLKM,
  FYKM,
  JZZBKM,
  JZSSKM,
  ENABLE_FLAG,
  CREATED_BY,
  CREATION_DATE
) VALUES(
  ${SETTING_ID},
  (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}),
  (SELECT c.CAT_CODE FROM xc_fa_cats c WHERE CONCAT(c.CAT_CODE, '||', c.CAT_NAME) = ${CAT_NAME}),
  (CASE WHEN ${SYNX} IS NULL OR ${SYNX} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(${SYNX}, DECIMAL(4,0)) END),
  ${ZJFF},
  (CASE WHEN ${SFZJ} = '是' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END),
  (SELECT l.VAL_CODE
     FROM xip_pub_val_set_dtl l
    WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_AMORTIZATION_RULE'
      AND l.VAL_NAME = ${TXGZ}),
   (CASE WHEN ${CZL} IS NULL OR ${CZL} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(${CZL}, DECIMAL(7,4)) END),
   (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${YZKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
    (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${LJZJTXKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
    (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${QLKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
    (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${FYKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
    (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${JZZBKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
    (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${JZSSKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
    'Y',
    ${CREATED_BY},
    ${CREATION_DATE}                                                                                                                                                        
)
UPDATE_SQL_STR:
UPDATE xc_fa_ld_cat_settings SET 
  LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}),
  CAT_CODE = (SELECT c.CAT_CODE FROM xc_fa_cats c WHERE CONCAT(c.CAT_CODE, '||', c.CAT_NAME) = ${CAT_NAME}),
  SYNX = (CASE WHEN ${SYNX} IS NULL OR ${SYNX} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(${SYNX}, DECIMAL(4,0)) END),
  ZJFF = ${ZJFF},
  SFZJ = (CASE WHEN ${SFZJ} = '是' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END),
  TXGZ = (SELECT l.VAL_CODE
     FROM xip_pub_val_set_dtl l
    WHERE l.VAL_SET_CODE = 'XC_FA_AMORTIZATION_RULE'
      AND l.VAL_NAME = ${TXGZ}),
  CZL = (CASE WHEN ${CZL} IS NULL OR ${CZL} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(${CZL}, DECIMAL(7,4)) END),
  YZKM = (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${YZKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  LJZJTXKM = (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${LJZJTXKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  QLKM = (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${QLKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  FYKM = (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${FYKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  JZZBKM = (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${JZZBKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  JZSSKM = (SELECT a.ACC_CODE
     FROM xc_gl_accounts a 
    WHERE CONCAT(a.ACC_CODE, '||', a.ACC_NAME) = ${JZSSKM} 
      AND a.ACC_HRCY_ID = (SELECT l.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                             FROM xc_gl_ledgers l 
                            WHERE l.ACC_HRCY_ID = a.ACC_HRCY_ID 
                              AND l.LEDGER_ID = (SELECT l.LEDGER_ID FROM xc_gl_ledgers l WHERE l.LEDGER_NAME = ${LEDGER_NAME}))),
  ENABLE_FLAG = 'Y',
  LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY},
  LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}  
WHERE SETTING_ID = ${SETTING_ID}
